text: Suchitra Sen (6 April 1931 - 17 January 2014) was an Indian actress. She appeared in over 100 Bengali movies. She was best known for her roles in Deep Jwele Jaai and Aandhi. Sen was born near Pabna, Bengal. She was awarded the Padma Shri in 1972. Sen died on January 17, 2014 from a heart attack. She was aged 82. She had been admitted due to an infection. ==References== ==Other websites== * * A Biography upperstal.com * Calcuttaweb article on Suchitra Sen Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian movie actors Category:People of British India
title: Suchitra Sen
